docs.text: Welcome to Aurelius Atlas Thank you for your interest in Aurelius Atlas Data Governance solution. Aurelius Atlas is an open-source Data Governance solution, based on a selection of open-source tools to facilitate business users to access governance information in an easy consumable way and meet the data governance demands of the distributed data world. This documentation provides an overview of the Aurelius Atlas solution, its architecture, and how to install and configure the solution. License Aurelius Atlas is an open-source solution, which can be used free under the Elastic V2 license agreement.
docs.title: Home
